description:
The Duke of York`s death is a blow both to Richard and to the Yorkist cause, but an unforeseen setback gives the Earl of Warwick and Edward time to rally their forces. How will Richard face the coming battle and a world without his father?
Source: Funimation

titles.title: I Am the Shadow, the Darkness Behind the Light
